Verses: 1 sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Naan Kanda Veroru Theengumundu. Adhu Manusharukkulle Perumbaalum Nadandhu Varugiradhu.

2 adhaavadhu, Oruvanukku Dhevan Selvaththaiyum Sambaththaiyum Ganaththaiyum Kodukkiraar; Avan Enna Ichchiththaalum Adhellaam Avanukkuk Kuraivillaamal Kidaikkum; Aanaalum Avaigalai Anubavikkum Sakthiyai Dhevan Avanukkuk Kodukkavillai; Anniya Manushan Adhai Anubavikkiraan; Idhuvum Maayaiyum Kodiya Noyumaanadhu.

3 oruvan Nooru Pillaigalaip Petru, Anegam Varusham Jeeviththu, Theerkkaayusai Adaindhirundhaalum, Avan Aaththumaa Andha Selvaththaal Thirupthiyadaiyaamalum, Avanukkup Predhakkallarai Mudhalaai Illaamalum Pogumaanaal, Avanaippaarkkilum Karuvazhindha Pindam Vaasi Engiren.
4 adhu Maayaiyaaith Thondri Irulile Maraindhupoividugiradhu; Adhinper Andhagaaraththaal Moodappadum.
5 adhu Sooriyanaik Kandadhumillai, Ondraiyum Arindhadhumillai; Avanukku Illaadha Amaichchal Adharku Undu.
6 avan Irandaayiram Varusham Pizhaiththirundhaalum Oru Nanmaiyaiyum Kaanbadhillai; Ellaarum Ore Idaththukkup Pogiraargal Allavaa?
7 manushan Padum Prayaasamellaam Avan Vaaikkaagaththaane; Avan Manadhukko Thirupthiyillai.
8 ippadiyirukka, Moodanaippaarkkilum Gnaanikku Undaagum Menmai Enna? Jeevanullorukku Munbaaga Nadandhukollumpadi Arindha Ezhaikkum Undaagum Menmai Enna?
9 aasaiyaanadhu Alaindhuthedugiradhaippaarkkilum Kan Kandadhe Nalam; Idhuvum Maayaiyum, Manadhai Sanjalappaduththugiradhumaayirukkiradhu.
10 irukkiravan Evanum Thondrumunname Peridappattirukkiraan; Avan Manushanendru Therindhirukkiradhu; Thannilum Balaththavarode Poraada Avanaal Koodaadhu.
11 maayaiyaip Perugappannugira Anega Viseshangal Undaayirukkirapadiyaal Adhile Manusharukkup Prayojanamenna?

12 nizhalaippondra Maayaiyaana Than Jeevakaalaththaip Pokkum Manushanukku Indha Jeevanil Nanmai Innadhendru Arindhavan Yaar? Thanakkuppinbu Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Sambavikkunkaariyam Innadhendru Manushanukku Arivippavan Yaar?
